Text: The torrent of this documentary - which received 100 out of 100 at Rotten Tomatoes - has only hard-codded Swedish subs.  No English or other languages.  I hope Demonoid has it in English.
Should be a great movie but we need english subtitles

English subtitles srt available at 
http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/4547176/in-film-nist-en

Enjoy!

Jafar Panahi locked up in one of the most horrible prisons in Iran,he is facing constant torture,he is in jail just for speaking against tyranny and oppressions committed by one of the most dangerous and backward regimes of our time.let's not to forget him by raising our voice & exposing mullah dictator Khamenei's crimes against humanity.
